entry.title: [EU][Dedicated Servers] - Server delivery
entry.content:
Oct 16, 15:00 UTC
Resolved - Start Time : 16/10/2022 13:50 UTC
End Time : 16/10/2022 14:27 UTC
Root cause : An equipment caused the incident
Our technical teams resolved the issue. All impacted services are now operational.

Oct 16, 14:30 UTC
Monitoring - Start time : 16/10/2022 13:50 UTC
Service impact : Server delivery were temporarily unavailable.
Root cause : Our teams restarted the equipment that caused the incident.
Ongoing actions : The current service is available. Our teams are monitoring the situation.
